In response to BostonSteve, I too tried this on Server 2003 R2, and it worked like a charm for me.

Reminds me of an old joke - What's better than winning gold at the Special Olympics?

Not being retarded!
I found that only the WGA Validation Patch v1.9.9.1 would work for me.

To all those who need help:

Anti-Virus's don't like cracks/keygens etc. So either tempoary disable your anti-virus (Not recommended) or Stop checking of the download folder (The one your downloaded torrents go into) This option is recommended...

Also you can download a registry updater that tells windows that office is genuine....

And I've found that only AntiWPA v3.4.6 would work for me.

(I've tried 1.9.9.1, and AntiWPA v3.3 before, and both of them failed.)

Thank you!

It worked for me today...WGA WGA Validation Patch v1.9.4.1 [26th March 2009]
Didn't try the other files.
Instructions are unclear though...
I just went in the subfolder "WGA Validation Patch v1.9.4.1 [26th March 2009]" and entered the WGA fixer
Thanks a lot !
